com.xmlmind.ditac.convert
Class StyleSheetCache

java.lang.Object
  com.xmlmind.ditac.convert.StyleSheetCache

public final class StyleSheetCache
extends Object

A simple XSL stylesheet cache.

This class is thread-safe and is intended to be shared between several Converters.

Constructor Summary
StyleSheetCache()
          Constructs an empty stylesheet cache.

Method Detail

newTransformer

public Transformer newTransformer(URL styleSheetURL,
                                  Console console)
                           throws Exception
Returns a Transformer corresponding to specified XSL stylesheet.

The first time specified XSL stylesheet is passed to the cache, a javax.xml.transform.Templates is created (that is, the stylesheet is parsed, a possibly lengthy operation) and cached in order to create more Transformers during subsequent invocations.

In order to create a javax.xml.transform.Templates, this cache first creates a javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory. Extension functions are registered with this factory using ExtensionFunctions.registerAll(javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory). An URI resolver, returned by Resolve.createURIResolver(), is registered with this factory.

This cache implements a very crude change detection:

  • It works only for plain files (i.e. not for http URLs).
  • A change is detected only for the stylesheet main file (i.e. changes in imported modules are not detected).

Parameters:
styleSheetURL - the URL of the XSL stylesheet for which a Transformer is to be created
console - console on which error and debug messages are displayed. May be null.
Returns:
a new, ready to use, Transformer
Throws:
Exception - if, for any reason, this operation fails
See Also:
Converter.Converter(StyleSheetCache, Console)

clear

public void clear(Console console)
Clear this cache.

Parameters:
console - console on which debug messages are displayed. May be null.
